entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Periods of snow beginning this morning then changing to rain this afternoon. Fog patches developing this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023
